name: 蔡舜宏
objective:
中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.
schedule:
week 1.　　Introduction
week 2.　　Initial value problem
week 3.　　Euler’s method and Heun’s method
week 4.　　Predictor-Corrector methods
week 5.　　Runge-Kutta methods
week 6.　　Multi-steps method (Adams method)
week 7.　　Quiz
week 8.　　Identification and modeling
week 9.　　Symbolic operations
week 10.　　LMIs
week 11.　　Simulink application for initial value problem and nonlinear systems
week 12.　　Midterm examination
week 13.　　Gradient descent
week 14.　　Newton's method
week 15.　　Gradient descent for linear regression
week 16.　　Logistic regression
week 17.　　Cross entropy of logistic regression and odds ratio
week 18.　　Final examination
scorePolicy: 1.　　Mid. Exam 30% 2. Final Exam 30%  3.  Quiz 20%  4. Homework 20%
